CustomField.description:
Nov 2016 - Data fed in from data warehouse integration.
3/1/17 - AL - info from Unify group regarding codes: D = Tax Supported N = Corporate Account R = Enterprise Rep account U – End User/Directed Buy (usually Uadvantage customers)
We also have but do not use anymore
C – Enterprise Mgr Acct W - Websource
